Summary Note:
Daantje Veenhoven and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Amsterdam. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Daantje Veenhoven is a 50 year old and comes from Netherlands.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Daantje Veenhoven is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Daantje obtained her secondary school diploma from Katholieke Scholengemeenschap Hoofddorp in 1994.
Daantje received her degree from Hogeschool van Amsterdam in 1997.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 26 years, Daantje Veenhoven has established herself as a key player in the industry.
At ASML Holding N.V., Daantje Veenhoven held the position of Software Developer from 1999 to 2004, developing essential skills in the field.
In 2006, she moved to Takeaway.com N.V. to work as a Startup Founder, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Her tenure as a CEO at GitPulse B.V. from 2010 to 2014 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
After 15 years of dedication, she assumed the role of Venture Capitalist at ASML Holding N.V. in 2014, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
She has been a Tech Industry Leader at GitPulse B.V. since 2016, consistently demonstrating her ability to adapt, innovate, and thrive in an ever-changing environment.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 480000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She owns house in Almere, where she resides. It is worth 1870000 EUR.

She inherited a significant sum of 3590000 EUR from her grandfather, a respected Real Estate Developer, in 2015, which she has wisely invested.
Client Summary: In summary, Daantje has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
